name: SNOMED CT Reason Medication Not Given Codes
description: This value set includes all medication refused, medication not administered, and non administration of necessary drug or medicine codes from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar value set.
copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright 2002 International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

concept.definition: The patient was not available when the dose was scheduled.
The patient was asleep when the dose was scheduled.
The patient was given the medication and immediately vomited it back.
